00046 static int lov_stripesize_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00047 {
00048         struct obd_device *dev = (struct obd_device *)m->private;
00049         struct lov_desc *desc;
00050 
00051         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00052         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00053 
00054         seq_printf(m, LPU64"\n", desc->ld_default_stripe_size);
00055         return 0;
00056 }
00057 
00058 static ssize_t lov_stripesize_seq_write(struct file *file,
00059                                         const char __user *buffer,
00060                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00061 {
00062         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00063         struct lov_desc *desc;
00064         __s64 val;
00065         int rc;
00066 
00067         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00068         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00069         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00070         if (rc)
00071                 return rc;
00072         if (val < 0)
00073                 return -ERANGE;
00074 
00075         lov_fix_desc_stripe_size(&val);
00076         desc->ld_default_stripe_size = val;
00077 
00078         return count;
00079 }
00080 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lov_stripesize);
00081

00093 static ssize_t lov_stripeoffset_seq_write(struct file *file,
00094                                           const char __user *buffer,
00095                                           size_t count, loff_t *off)
00096 {
00097         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00098         struct lov_desc *desc;
00099         __s64 val;
00100         int rc;
00101 
00102         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00103         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00104         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00105         if (rc)
00106                 return rc;
00107         if (val < 0)
00108                 return -ERANGE;
00109 
00110         desc->ld_default_stripe_offset = val;
00111 
00112         return count;
00113 }
00114 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lov_stripeoffset);

00116 static int lov_stripetype_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00117 {
00118         struct obd_device* dev = (struct obd_device*)m->private;
00119         struct lov_desc *desc;
00120 
00121         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00122         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00123         seq_printf(m, "%u\n", desc->ld_pattern);
00124         return 0;
00125 }
00126 
00127 static ssize_t lov_stripetype_seq_write(struct file *file,
00128                                         const char __user *buffer,
00129                                         size_t count, loff_t *off)
00130 {
00131         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00132         struct lov_desc *desc;
00133         int pattern, rc;
00134         __s64 val;
00135 
00136         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00137         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00138         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00139         if (rc)
00140                 return rc;
00141         if (val < INT_MIN || val > INT_MAX)
00142                 return -ERANGE;
00143 
00144         pattern = val;
00145         lov_fix_desc_pattern(&pattern);
00146         desc->ld_pattern = pattern;
00147 
00148         return count;
00149 }
00150 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lov_stripetype);
00151 
00152 static int lov_stripecount_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00153 {
00154         struct obd_device *dev = (struct obd_device *)m->private;
00155         struct lov_desc *desc;
00156 
00157         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00158         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00159         seq_printf(m, "%d\n",
00160                   (__s16)(desc->ld_default_stripe_count + 1) - 1);
00161         return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 static ssize_t lov_stripecount_seq_write(struct file *file,
00165                                          const char __user *buffer,
00166                                          size_t count, loff_t *off)
00167 {
00168         struct obd_device *dev = ((struct seq_file *)file->private_data)->private;
00169         struct lov_desc *desc;
00170         int rc;
00171         __u32 stripe_count;
00172         __s64 val;
00173 
00174         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00175         desc = &dev->u.lov.desc;
00176         rc = lprocfs_str_to_s64(buffer, count, &val);
00177         if (rc)
00178                 return rc;
00179         if (val < 0)
00180                 return -ERANGE;
00181 
00182         stripe_count = val;
00183         lov_fix_desc_stripe_count(&stripe_count);
00184         desc->ld_default_stripe_count = stripe_count;
00185 
00186         return count;
00187 }
00188 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS(lov_stripecount);

00214 static int lov_desc_uuid_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *v)
00215 {
00216         struct obd_device *dev = m->private;
00217         struct lov_obd *lov;
00218 
00219         LASSERT(dev != NULL);
00220         lov = &dev->u.lov;
00221         seq_printf(m, "%s\n", lov->desc.ld_uuid.uuid);
00222         return 0;
00223 }
00224 LPROC_SEQ_FOPS_RO(lov_desc_uuid);
00225 
00226 static void *lov_tgt_seq_start(struct seq_file *p, loff_t *pos)
00227 {
00228         struct obd_device *dev = p->private;
00229         struct lov_obd *lov = &dev->u.lov;
00230 
00231         while (*pos < lov->desc.ld_tgt_count) {
00232                 if (lov->lov_tgts[*pos])
00233                         return lov->lov_tgts[*pos];
00234                 ++*pos;
00235         }
00236         return NULL;
00237 }
00238 
00239 static void lov_tgt_seq_stop(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00240 {
00241 }
00242 
00243 static void *lov_tgt_seq_next(struct seq_file *p, void *v, loff_t *pos)
00244 {
00245         struct obd_device *dev = p->private;
00246         struct lov_obd *lov = &dev->u.lov;
00247 
00248         while (++*pos < lov->desc.ld_tgt_count) {
00249                 if (lov->lov_tgts[*pos])
00250                         return lov->lov_tgts[*pos];
00251         }
00252         return NULL;
00253 }
00254 
00255 static int lov_tgt_seq_show(struct seq_file *p, void *v)
00256 {
00257         struct lov_tgt_desc *tgt = v;
00258         seq_printf(p, "%d: %s %sACTIVE\n", tgt->ltd_index,
00259                    obd_uuid2str(&tgt->ltd_uuid),
00260                    tgt->ltd_active ? "" : "IN");
00261         return 0;
00262 }
00263 
00264 static const struct seq_operations lov_tgt_sops = {
00265         .start = lov_tgt_seq_start,
00266         .stop = lov_tgt_seq_stop,
00267         .next = lov_tgt_seq_next,
00268         .show = lov_tgt_seq_show,
00269 };
00270 
00271 static int lov_target_seq_open(struct inode *inode, struct file *file)
00272 {
00273         struct seq_file *seq;
00274         int rc;
00275 
00276         rc = LPROCFS_ENTRY_CHECK(inode);
00277         if (rc < 0)
00278                 return rc;
00279 
00280         rc = seq_open(file, &lov_tgt_sops);
00281         if (rc)
00282                 return rc;
00283 
00284         seq = file->private_data;
00285         seq->private = PDE_DATA(inode);
00286         return 0;
00287 }
00288

00329 struct file_operations lov_proc_target_fops = {
00330         .owner   = THIS_MODULE,
00331         .open    = lov_target_seq_open,
00332         .read    = seq_read,
00333         .llseek  = seq_lseek,
00334         .release = lprocfs_seq_release,
